name: PROCEED: Infinite, Hand Painted Universe.
description:
Live On Kickstarter Now: Click Here To See More & Support

Welcome to Proceed, a 2D Action game with a focus on combat, survival and exploration, set across a procedurally generated universe. Proceed is a single player experience, you play as an Artificial Intelligence named Prox-E, built to find a new home for humanity.

  • An Infinite universe, just for you: Filled with bizarre and terrifying creatures, deadly enemy AIs and challenging environments.
  • Defeat powerful foes: In your search for a suitable home planet, you will encounter AI's older and far more powerful than yourself. These hive minds will take time, skill and resources to destroy.
  • A focus on upgrades: start out frustratingly vulnerable and upgrade using a vast array of technologies, each having a dramatic effect on gameplay.
  • Day/Night cycles and dynamic weather patterns: Deadly weather types will test your Mech's upgrades and your reflexes.
  • Form an exploration strategy with a variety of upgradable droids: The balanced Mech, the heavy duty rover tank or the nimble drone. (More on this below)

Don't forget to Support on Kickstarter
